remarks: Letterwise operations on word concatenations.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Oct-2018.)
statement:
ofcccat.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. Word S ) $.
ofcccat.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Word S ) $.
ofcccat.3 $e |- ( ph -> K e. T ) $.
ofcccat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F concat G ) oFC R K ) = ( ( F oFC R K ) concat ( G oFC R K ) ) ) $.
